diagnosis:
⚠️ DESIGN GAP DETECTED

DDE and ACC passed, but BDV failed.

This indicates a gap between implementation and business intent. The system is technically correct and architecturally sound, but doesn't meet user needs or acceptance criteria.

Action: Revisit requirements and contracts. Re-align implementation with business goals. The technical quality is good, but you've built the wrong thing.
recommendations: Update scenarios to match deployed contract versions: AuthAPI:v1.2 -> v1.3
Add scenarios for critical user journeys

failing_scenarios: User login flow doesn't match new requirements
Search results don't match expected behavior
